text: O you who believe ! do not follow the footsteps of the devil, and whoever follows the footsteps of the devil, then he will certainly enjoin indecency and that which is not recognized (as good), and had the grace of God not been on you with His mercy, not (even) one of you would have ever been pure, but God purifies whom He wills and God is Hearing, Knowing. , but God purifies whom He wills and God is Hearing, Knowing
